task.title: Replace daemon terminology and logic with broker across CLI/dashboard

events.content: Adopt broker-first cloud endpoints with daemon fallback: Adopt broker-first cloud endpoints with daemon fallback

raw.question: Adopt broker-first cloud endpoints with daemon fallback
raw.chosen: Adopt broker-first cloud endpoints with daemon fallback
raw.reasoning: Cloud/server versions may still expose /api/daemons, so use /api/brokers first and transparently fall back on 404 to avoid breakage during rollout.

retrospective.summary: Replaced daemon terminology with broker across CLI, config/utils, and dashboard; switched to broker-first cloud endpoints with compatibility fallbacks and validated via tests/typecheck.
